attributes.subject: Naproxen side effects
attributes.body: Upset stomach is a common side effect of this medication.  Mild stomach pain is normal, but if you are having severe stomach pains, please let us know or seek in-person care.

attributes.subject: Vaccine Booster
attributes.body: As discussed in your last visit, we recommend getting a vaccine booster to improve your immunity to COVID-19. Please let us know if you have any other questions.
